backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining the backend for the Vitalis Water Scratch & Win app, with stable maps for submissions and user profiles, and endpoints for submitting claims, querying/filtering submissions, marking redemptions, and managing user profiles with basic access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a single feature (end-to-end claim submission persistence and retrieval fix) to its affected file `useQueries.ts`, related components, and test ID REQ-31.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference index for the project's React/TypeScript frontend components, hooks, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS entry point that imports Tailwind base/components/utilities and defines CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes covering colors, borders, charts, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Vite/React app, mounting the React root into `<div id='root'>` and loading `src/main.tsx` as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing navigation between the ScratchPage and AdminPanel views, handling admin authentication state via sessionStorage, and wiring browser history popstate events.
Modal dialog component for admin login that validates hardcoded email/password credentials and calls `onSuccess` or displays an error message on failure.
frontend/src/components/ClaimForm.tsx: Glassmorphism claim form component collecting state, city, UPI ID, and feedback fields, then invoking the `useSubmitClaim` mutation with all required fields and displaying success or user-friendly error states.
frontend/src/components/Confetti.tsx: Renders a canvas-based confetti animation with particles when `triggered` is true, and plays a winning chime sound once on trigger.
frontend/src/components/ConfirmationNoti: Displays an animated confirmation overlay card with a checkmark, reward amount, and coin animations that auto-closes after 6 seconds.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with the Vitalis logo, copyright year, tagline, and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Displays the hero section with a 'Scan. Scratch. Win.' tagline, a bottle image with emoji fallback, and a subtitle.
frontend/src/components/Logo.tsx: Renders the Vitalis Water logo image with a text/emoji fallback and an optional double-click handler.
frontend/src/components/RewardReveal.tsx: Shows a reward card displaying the won amount in rupees and a button to scroll down to the claim form.
frontend/src/components/ScratchCard.tsx: Renders an interactive scratch card with a canvas overlay that reveals the reward amount and coupon code as the user scratches past a 60% threshold.
frontend/src/components/WaterDropIntro.t: Animates a full-screen canvas intro with falling water drops over a gradient background for ~2.2 seconds, then calls `onComplete`.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, AuthClient management, and status tracking via a React context and hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including user profiles, claim submissions, and admin operations, with canister-stopped error normalization.
frontend/src/hooks/useScratchCanvas.ts: Custom hook that manages a scratch-card canvas, handling drawing logic, pointer events, progress calculation, and triggering a reveal callback when a configurable threshold is reached.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining Tailwind directives, CSS design tokens (colors, radii, brand variables), and component-specific styles for the scratch card UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin dashboard page displaying all submissions with filtering/stats, and a coupon verification panel that allows searching and marking coupons as redeemed.
frontend/src/pages/ScratchPage.tsx: Main user-facing page orchestrating the scratch card flow: intro animation, scratch interaction, reward reveal, claim form, confetti, and admin login modal.
frontend/src/utils/audioGenerator.ts: Utility module that generates and plays procedural scratch noise and winning chime sounds using the Web Audio API.
frontend/src/utils/rewardGenerator.ts: Utility that generates a weighted random reward amount (₹10–₹100) and a unique coupon code string in the format VW-XXXX-XXXX.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with helpers to persist/retrieve values via sessionStorage and clean sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom fonts, colors (including brand 'vitalis' palette), border radii, box shadows, keyframe animations, and enabling the animate, typography, and container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project state snapshot describing a mobile-first Scratch & Win reward site for 'Vitalist Water', including architectural decisions, weighted reward distribution, admin panel details, and a list of known bugs to fix.
